title: Last pick in Solo Queue Ranked game... Team listens and makes good picks.
body:
"So I have to play top" I said to myself. "Darius is the perfect freelo."

Mouse over Darius.

Click.

# HUGE FUCKING "Retrieving Data from Server..." BOX RIGHT IN MY FACE
-
#CAN'T CLICK ANYTHING NOTHING IS HAPPENING
-
#COUNTDOWN 5... 4... 3... 2... 1...

*You have been kicked from the lobby for not picking a champion*.

Me;

https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Captain-Picard-Facepalm.jpg
